<!-- BEGIN_AUTOGENERATED -->

# Restarg Node Formatting

Represents positional rest argument (i.e. `*foo` in `def m(*foo); end`)

<!-- END_AUTOGENERATED -->

## Formats

Before:

```ruby
def concat(*items)
  self + items
end
```

After:

```ruby
def concat(*items)
  self + items
end
```

## Formats in last arg position

Before:

```ruby
def flatten(head, *tail)
  self << head
  flatten(*tail)
end
```

After:

```ruby
def flatten(head, *tail)
  self << head
  flatten(*tail)
end
```
